TG_API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID. Get this value from my.telegram.org!

TG_API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API hash. Get this value from my.telegram.org!

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API.Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

PUBLIC_URL.description: The Heroku App URL similar to https://<appname>.herokuapp.com/
